title: Power to serve
creator_credit: Kenneth J. Fairbairn and Athos Film Productions
brief_description: The significance of power as a servant of the British industrial community. Explains how scientific understanding and technological skills are utilised and deployed in the manufacture of different power units; concentrates on engines and hows something of the research and testing undertaken before quantity production can commence.
